title: Know this font? (this might be tricky)
content:
Hi guys,  
After searching for this font all day, I almost give up! No of the font sites I have tried, know it. Maybe you do?  
I am looking for the font on this page header(the handwriting font saying "Mija")

--\>: [http://mija.creatorsofdesire.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019065744/http:/mija.creatorsofdesire.com/ "http://mija.creatorsofdesire.com/")

Hope you can help me!
author: simmelim
